title: Candy Bubble
description: Match colorful candies in this delightful puzzle adventure!
introText: Match colorful candies to clear levels in this sweet puzzle game!
instructions: Swap adjacent candies to create matches of 3 or more
Create special candies by matching 4 or more in a row
Clear all obstacles and reach the target score
Complete each level before running out of moves
Unlock new levels and challenges as you progress
controlsText: Click or tap on a candy and then on an adjacent candy to swap them and create matches!

title: Owl and Rabbit Fashion
description: Create stylish outfits for cute animal characters in this fashionable game.
introText: Create stylish outfits for the cute Owl and Rabbit characters in this fashion game!
instructions: Choose which character you want to style
Select clothing items from different categories (tops, bottoms, dresses)
Add accessories like hats, glasses, and jewelry
Mix and match colors and styles to create the perfect look
Save your creation or start a new outfit
controlsText: Be creative and experiment with different combinations to make your characters look fabulous!

title: Cat Doctor
description: Treat and take care of adorable feline patients in this veterinary simulation.
introText: Help sick and injured cats recover in this veterinary simulation game!
instructions: Examine your feline patients to identify their health issues
Use different medical tools to treat various conditions
Follow the treatment steps in the correct order
Clean and bandage wounds, give medicine, or perform procedures
Complete all treatments to make the cat healthy
controlsText: Use your mouse or touchscreen to interact with the medical tools and follow the treatment steps.

title: Pets Beauty Salon
description: Pamper adorable pets with stylish makeovers in this fun salon simulator.
introText: In Pets Beauty Salon, you'll take care of cute animals and help them look their best!
instructions: Select a pet to style from the available options
Clean and groom your pet with various tools
Apply cosmetics, accessories, and outfits
Complete all tasks to finish the makeover
Take a photo of your finished work!
controlsText: Use your mouse or touchscreen to interact with the salon tools and create adorable pet styles.

title: Tile Match
description: Match identical tiles and clear the board in this addictive puzzle game.
introText: Challenge your memory and matching skills in this addictive tile puzzle game!
instructions: Find and match identical tiles on the board
Connect matching tiles with a line that has at most 2 turns
Matched tiles will disappear from the board
Clear all tiles before the time runs out
Complete levels to unlock new challenges and tile designs
controlsText: Use your mouse or touch the screen to select and match tiles. Plan carefully to clear the board efficiently!

title: Weird Dance
description: Create hilarious dance routines and watch funny characters perform them.
introText: Join the fun and show off your best dance moves in this quirky dancing game!
instructions: Select your favorite weird dancer character
Follow the on-screen dance prompts by tapping or clicking at the right time
Match your moves to the beat of the music
Perform special combos to earn bonus points
Unlock new dance moves and outfits as you progress
controlsText: Use your mouse, keyboard arrows, or touch the screen to perform dance moves. The more accurate your timing, the higher your score!

title: LOL Surprise BB Driver
description: Race with your favorite LOL Surprise characters in this fun driving game.
introText: Get behind the wheel with your favorite LOL Surprise characters in this exciting racing game!
instructions: Choose your LOL Surprise character and vehicle
Navigate through colorful tracks and obstacles
Collect bonuses and power-ups along the way
Use special abilities to gain advantage in the race
Finish first to unlock new characters and tracks
controlsText: Use the arrow keys or on-screen controls to steer, accelerate, and brake. Race against the clock or compete with other characters to become the champion!
